content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify one and only one thing that the Trojan children do in lines 5-6 (Pueri...gaudent).

frqParts.text: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words. Identify one and only one thing that the Trojan children do in lines 5-6 (Pueri...gaudent).

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
